name: WWII - Call for Medic
description:
This is a Game Jam arcade game I made for the Extra Credits game jam themed Take Care. I seen a couple of videos on the history of WWII and I though about all the medics that were used for allied troops.

Your Mission: 

You are a WWII Medic in the battle of Normandy invasion taking care of your troops by healing them back to the game.
